item.title: Alt Transformer Project Description
item.description: #project I’m a driven Data Scientist Intern, with a deep interest in machine learning and natural language processing. I recently finished a course in Deep Learning and have worked on impactful projects such as drug discovery research with a professor.

item.title: Augment WLASL
item.description: #stablediffusion previous attempt My little attempt at straight training an entire stable diffusion model on just the WLASL dataset was fairly ineffectual.

item.title: Comparing the performance of Hebbian against backpropagation learning using conv nns
item.description: Comparing the performance of Hebbian against backpropagation learning using conv nns #Omnivore #hebbian Read on Omnivore Read Original Highlights The results on various datasets are compared with those obtained by unsupervised VAE, and the potentials and limitations of the methods are highlighted; we also deemed interesting to report the results of supervised backprop training in our discussion; ‚§¥Ô∏è ^02caac6f

item.description: Comparing the performance of Hebbian against backpropagation learning using convolutional neural networks | SpringerLink #Omnivore #hebbian Read on Omnivore Read Original

item.title: Evaluating Hebbian Learning in a Semi-supervised Setting - SpringerLink
item.description: Evaluating Hebbian Learning in a Semi-supervised Setting | SpringerLink #Omnivore #hebbian Read on Omnivore Read Original Highlights In this work, we propose a semi-supervised learning approach, in which the unsupervised pre-training step is performed by means of the Hebbian learning paradigm.

item.title: Hebbian Learning
item.description: #hebbian It’s an alternative to backprop that uses only local update rules. It seems far more similar to spiking neural networks in that it tries to follow a more “fires together, wires together” paradigm.

item.title: Visualize a Codebase
item.description: #project #python Summary: It’s hard to understand codebases. I’d like an automatic tool for it, that can show it to me in a visual structure.
